headerSection.sectionDescription: Multiple ways to get your data into Integrity: Templates, Manual Entry, PDF Bills, or API Integrations

descriptionCard.title: Enterprise-Grade Data Templates
descriptionCard.description: Download pre-configured CSV/XLS templates with validation rules, examples, and field guides. Perfect for bulk imports from billing systems that don't have API access.

cardSection.title: AI Cost Entry Template
cardSection.description: Import AI platform costs, infrastructure expenses, and vendor bills
cardSection.footerDescription: Includes validation rules, examples, and field descriptions

cardSection.title: ROI & Value Realization Template
cardSection.description: Track revenue gains, cost savings, and efficiency improvements
cardSection.footerDescription: Includes validation rules, examples, and field descriptions

cardSection.title: Usage & Consumption Template
cardSection.description: Track API calls, compute hours, token usage, and resource consumption
cardSection.footerDescription: Includes validation rules, examples, and field descriptions

steps.title: Download Template
steps.description: Choose the template that matches your data type and download it

steps.title: Fill in Your Data
steps.description: Open in Excel/Google Sheets, fill in your data following the examples

steps.title: Upload & Validate
steps.description: Upload the completed file - we'll validate and import automatically

details.title: Upload CSV/XLS File
details.description: Bulk import cost entries, ROI data, or usage metrics from your filled template

details.title: PDF Bill Processing
details.description: Upload PDF bills from vendors without API access. We'll extract the data automatically using OCR.
